mapper.select: select count(*) from anyquant.MonthQdata_${siid} where date >= #{date1} and date <= #{date2}

select monthid as id,date,m5,m10,m20,m30,bias5,bias10,bias20, boll1,boll2,boll3,rsi,rsi5,rsi10,rsi20,vr,rsv,k,d,j, ema12,ema26,ema50,ema5,ema35,ema10,ema60, diff,dea,macd, dmh,dml,tr,dmh12,dml12,tr12,dih,dil,dih12,dil12,dx,adx,adxr, obv,roc12,roc25 from anyquant.MonthQdata_${siid} where date=#{date1}

select monthid as id,date,m5,m10,m20,m30,bias5,bias10,bias20, boll1,boll2,boll3,rsi,rsi5,rsi10,rsi20,vr,rsv,k,d,j, ema12,ema26,ema50,ema5,ema35,ema10,ema60, diff,dea,macd, dmh,dml,tr,dmh12,dml12,tr12,dih,dil,dih12,dil12,dx,adx,adxr, obv,roc12,roc25 from anyquant.MonthQdata_${siid} where date >= #{date1} order by monthid

select monthid as id,date,m5,m10,m20,m30,bias5,bias10,bias20, boll1,boll2,boll3,rsi,rsi5,rsi10,rsi20,vr,rsv,k,d,j, ema12,ema26,ema50,ema5,ema35,ema10,ema60, diff,dea,macd, dmh,dml,tr,dmh12,dml12,tr12,dih,dil,dih12,dil12,dx,adx,adxr, obv,roc12,roc25 from anyquant.MonthQdata_${siid} where date <= #{date1} order by monthid

select monthid as id,date,m5,m10,m20,m30,bias5,bias10,bias20, boll1,boll2,boll3,rsi,rsi5,rsi10,rsi20,vr,rsv,k,d,j, ema12,ema26,ema50,ema5,ema35,ema10,ema60, diff,dea,macd, dmh,dml,tr,dmh12,dml12,tr12,dih,dil,dih12,dil12,dx,adx,adxr, obv,roc12,roc25 from anyquant.MonthQdata_${siid} where date > #{date1} order by monthid

select monthid as id,date,m5,m10,m20,m30,bias5,bias10,bias20, boll1,boll2,boll3,rsi,rsi5,rsi10,rsi20,vr,rsv,k,d,j, ema12,ema26,ema50,ema5,ema35,ema10,ema60, diff,dea,macd, dmh,dml,tr,dmh12,dml12,tr12,dih,dil,dih12,dil12,dx,adx,adxr, obv,roc12,roc25 from anyquant.MonthQdata_${siid} where date < #{date1} order by monthid

select monthid as id,date,m5,m10,m20,m30,bias5,bias10,bias20, boll1,boll2,boll3,rsi,rsi5,rsi10,rsi20,vr,rsv,k,d,j, ema12,ema26,ema50,ema5,ema35,ema10,ema60, diff,dea,macd, dmh,dml,tr,dmh12,dml12,tr12,dih,dil,dih12,dil12,dx,adx,adxr, obv,roc12,roc25 from anyquant.MonthQdata_${siid} where date >= #{date1} and date <= #{date2} order by monthid

select monthid as id,date,m5,m10,m20,m30,bias5,bias10,bias20, boll1,boll2,boll3,rsi,rsi5,rsi10,rsi20,vr,rsv,k,d,j, ema12,ema26,ema50,ema5,ema35,ema10,ema60, diff,dea,macd, dmh,dml,tr,dmh12,dml12,tr12,dih,dil,dih12,dil12,dx,adx,adxr, obv,roc12,roc25 from anyquant.MonthQdata_${siid} where monthid between #{id1}-#{num}+1 and #{id1} order by monthid

select monthid as id,date,m5,m10,m20,m30,bias5,bias10,bias20, boll1,boll2,boll3,rsi,rsi5,rsi10,rsi20,vr,rsv,k,d,j, ema12,ema26,ema50,ema5,ema35,ema10,ema60, diff,dea,macd, dmh,dml,tr,dmh12,dml12,tr12,dih,dil,dih12,dil12,dx,adx,adxr, obv,roc12,roc25 from anyquant.MonthQdata_${siid} where monthid = #{id1}

select monthid as id,date,m5,m10,m20,m30,bias5,bias10,bias20, boll1,boll2,boll3,rsi,rsi5,rsi10,rsi20,vr,rsv,k,d,j, ema12,ema26,ema50,ema5,ema35,ema10,ema60, diff,dea,macd, dmh,dml,tr,dmh12,dml12,tr12,dih,dil,dih12,dil12,dx,adx,adxr, obv,roc12,roc25 from anyquant.MonthQdata_${siid} where monthid <= #{id1} order by monthid

select monthid as id,date,m5,m10,m20,m30,bias5,bias10,bias20, boll1,boll2,boll3,rsi,rsi5,rsi10,rsi20,vr,rsv,k,d,j, ema12,ema26,ema50,ema5,ema35,ema10,ema60, diff,dea,macd, dmh,dml,tr,dmh12,dml12,tr12,dih,dil,dih12,dil12,dx,adx,adxr, obv,roc12,roc25 from anyquant.MonthQdata_${siid} where monthid between #{id1} and #{id2} order by monthid
